text: janatava (saturan) soya yamedi oba (podiyak ho) kammæli novanu. (eyin) obata amarukamak æti vuvada (eya etaram gananayata noganu. mandayat) oba amarukama vindinnak menma ovunda amarukama vindina atara, ovun balaporottu viya nohæki (jayada, honda phalavipakada) oba allah vetin balaporottu vannehuya. allah itamat hondin danneku vasayen ha gnanavantayeku vasayen sitinneya
